f7d3e1d9-9b54-4bd4-816a-b5d59918246c.description: Earners of the FIMC® credential have advanced skills in classifying medical data from patient records, generally in a clinical setting. These coding practitioners possess expertise in the ICD-10-CM, CPT and HCPCS Level II coding systems. They are knowledgeable about medical terminology, disease processes, and pharmacology. They are able to review patients' records and assign numeric codes for each diagnosis and procedure. They can apply policies for access and disclosure of health information
f7d3e1d9-9b54-4bd4-816a-b5d59918246c.name: Fellowship-International Medical Coding (FIMC)

alignments.name: FIMC Standards
alignments.description: The skills learned through the FIMC are essential to hospitals, physician offices, surgery centres, nursing homes, dental offices, home healthcare agencies, mental health facilities and even insurance companies and consulting firms.

badge_template_activities.title: The fellowship is geared toward people currently in the medical field who want to advance their careers by understanding the specific rules and regulations with medical coding. The FIMC proves that you are successful in your coding job and proves to your employer that you have advanced coding knowledge and stay up to date on all yearly coding changes.
Score a passing grade on the FIMC ® Exam (Fellowship in Medical Coding)

Complete all the following courses: anatomy & physiology, pathophysiology, pharmacology, medical terminology, reimbursement methodology, intermediate/advanced ICD diagnostic/procedural and CPT coding, HCPCS, HIPAA and Medical Billing

Describe a medical record’s format, standards, types of documentation, organization, retention, applicable laws; consent forms; purpose and elements of a compliance plan; Medicare fraud, Medicare abuse, and other abuses/offences, assign appropriate medical codes as per AHA, AMA. CMS, AHIMA Coding Guidelines.
Medical Coders Creed- Clinical documentation, Communication with clinicians, Coding standards , Conventions, Classification experience , Query process. Common sense, Science of medicine

b06fe34a-3570-417c-9f9b-02035aa56f5d.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the mastery and is able to apply medical coding practices specifically for COVID-19 and related manifestations. This earner is knowledgeable about ICD-10-CM, CPT, ICD-10-PCS, COVID-19 Vaccination coding.
b06fe34a-3570-417c-9f9b-02035aa56f5d.name: COVID-19 Medical Coder

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a self-paced online module Successful completions of included knowledge checks within each course.

Complete all the following courses: anatomy & physiology, pathophysiology, pharmacology, medical terminology, reimbursement methodology, intermediate/advanced ICD diagnostic/procedural and CPT coding, HCPCS, HIPAA and Medical Billing

Describe a medical record’s format, standards, types of documentation, organization, retention, applicable laws; consent forms; purpose and elements of a compliance plan; Medicare fraud, Medicare abuse, and other abuses/offences, assign appropriate medical codes as per AHA, AMA. CMS, AHIMA Coding Guidelines.
